title: Video Premiere: Blaenavon – Denim Patches
body:
These über talented kids clearly have a remarkable future ahead of them.

From playing their first London show earlier in the week, to being featured on NME’s Radar, [**Blaenavon**](http://www.facebook.com/blaenavonmusic) are grasping 2012 by the throat. Having [Introduced](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/12867-introducing-blaenavon/) the group last year and been completely astounded by their confidence, maturity and songwriting skills, we jumped at the chance to premiere their first ever official music video for the stunning _Denim Patches_. Composed half of their own footage and half of collected clips, there’s a strong narrative throughout, with the contemplative, idyllic scenes mirroring the delicate atmosphere of the track, it’s a perfect visual debut. Immerse yourself in the video for **Blaenavon’s** _Denim Patches_ by **Johnny Griffiths** below.

Download via [Bandcamp](http://blaenavon.bandcamp.com/album/download-all).
